title: Chapter 1861 - Reaching The Peak Of Spiritual Desolation Mountain
body:
Chapter 1861 - Reaching The Peak Of Spiritual Desolation Mountain

Whoosh!

The moment the man in the feather coat looked over, Su Yi vanished into thin air.

This is bad! The man in the feather coat shot to his feet, heart shaking. A massive wheel of electric light rose from his palm, and as it revolved, a world of lightning rose into the air. A Grand Dao Hidden Realm——the Sound of Thunder Purgatory!

Practically simultaneously, Su Yi appeared out of nowhere and pressed down.

Bang!!!

The Grand Dao Hidden Realm abruptly caved in, then split. A rain of light scattered, illuminating the man in the feather coat’s face. He looked utterly horrified.

Before he could dodge, Su Yi stretched out his right hand and grabbed. Tyrannical power of the Grand Dao sealed the man in the feather coat completely. He was trapped like prey, unable to move a muscle.

And Su Yi did it all in one smooth motion, striking like lightning. It was over as soon as it began.

“Tell me: where are the other two?” said Su Yi, his gaze calm and distant.

“They’re…” The man in the feather coat hesitated, then shouted at the top of his lungs, “We’re under attack!! Hurry up and—”

Bang!!

Su Yi tightened...
original_title: Chapter 1861 - Reaching the Peak of Spiritual Desolation Mountain
